body.name: Wireless Bluetooth Mouse USB C for MacBook Air Pro, Rechargeable Wireless Mouse Type C, Silent Bluetooth Mouse for iMac Pro Air/Surface Pro/Samsung/Tablet/iPhone
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 1 min
features: 【Easy and Stable Connection】The wireless bluetooth mouse can be connected with bluetooth 5.2/ 3.0 or 2.4G USB. It comes with a nano receiver (stored in the back of the mouse). With advanced optical tracking technology, the computer mouse has stronger anti-interference, faster transmission speed and more reliable connection.

【Ergonomic Design & 3 Adjustable DPI】The usb mouse gives you long-term comfort thanks to its contoured shape, thumb area and side grips that keep your hand fixed in place. Besides, you can change the speed of the cordless mouse with one click(DPI 800/ 1200/ 1600).

【Silent & Durable】This silent mute mouse can reduce the noise of 96% of clicks. You can concentrated on work, never worry about disturbing others. The mouse for laptop has long-term service life due to 5 million click tests.

【Rechargeable & Energy Saving】With built-in 500mAh battery, the bluetooth mouse can be charged via USB cable, convenient for you to charge it anytime, anywhere. The wireless mouse has an intelligent auto-sleep mode to save power, it will go into light/deep sleep mode after 1/10 minutes of inactivity. (The mouse is insensitive while running out of battery, please charge it in time. 2-3h to charge, the green light is on for charging, it is off for full charge. The red light is on when working.)

【Wide Compatibility】Compared with other mouse, this wireless mouse is equipped with Type C adapter, providing more ways to connect to your laptops, desktops, PCs, Windows, Linux, Mac OS, iPad. Its practical value makes it the perfect companion for your study, work, and entertainment needs.

【Quality Guarantee】Product Dimensions: 4 x 2.6 x 1.4 inches (LxWxH). Package Contents: 1x Wireless Mouse, 1x 2.4G Nano USB Receiver, 1x Type C Adapter, 1x Charging Cable, 1x Manual. If you meet any problems when using the mouse, please feel free to contact our professional customer service team, enjoying Aigeer 18 Months Warranty.

productInformation.value: Bluetooth, USB, 4 Modes Switching, Type C

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Wireless, Portable, Ergonomic Design, Soundless, Rechargeable

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mode 1 - Bluetooth 5.2 1. Switch the BT/OF/2.4G button of the mouse to Bluetooth mode, turn on the Bluetooth device and look for ''BT5.2 Mouse''. 2. For iPad - Settings - Accessibility - Touch - Assistive Touch - turn it on. Note: The mouse can‘t be connected to two bluetooth devices at the same time. If you want to connect other device, you need to disconnect the original one first. If you can't find bluetooth after replacing the device, turn off the bluetooth mouse connected before, re-start the bluetooth device and the mouse, long press the DPI button to connect to the bluetooth device. Mode 2 - 2.4GHz 1. Switch the ON/OFF button to 2.4G mode. 2. Just plug the USB receiver into the USB port of the computer and start using it. 3. If your computer is USB-C port, first plug the Type C adapter into the computer, and then plug the USB receiver into the Type C adapter.

Ergonomic Design All sizes of hands can be firmly fixed in the appropriate position. The ergonomic wireless mouse provides you with long-term comfort. Silent Click This silent mouse can reduce click noise by 96%. Help you concentrate on your work easily. Never worry about disturbing others, suitable for library, room, meeting, etc. Wide Compatibility 2.4GHz wireless technology provides stable connection and precise track. The USB mouse is equipped with Type C adapter, providing more ways to connect to PC, iPad, Mac, Chrome, etc.

Auto-Sleep Mode The wireless mouse will go into light/ deep sleep mode after 1min/ 10 minutes of inactivity to save power. Click any button, it starts working. Rechargeable USB Mouse The wireless mouse is rechargeable, you can charge it anytime, anywhere. The charging time is about 2.5 h. The green light on means charging, green light off means fully charged. Portable Design Appropriate size: 4in x 2.6in x 1.4in, suitable for multiple occasions like travel, office, study, meeting, meet all your needs.

Questions and Answers Q1: Why is the Bluetooth disconnected after a few minutes? 1) Low battery (please charge it in time). 2) The computer is in sleep mode (set the power mode to "Balanced" mode). Q2: Why is the cursor inaccurate? 1) Low battery (please charge it in time). 2) Use a mouse pad, please. Q3: Failed to connect to “BT5.2 mouse"? Delete "BT5.2 mouse" - Turn off the mouse - Turn on the mouse and click the button - Flash blue light - Reconnect "BT5.2 mouse". Q4: The mouse works fine when it first connected to the "tablet". But it doesn't work when it connected to other devices. Please delete "BT5.2 mouse" on your tablet and reconnect.

Wireless Bluetooth Mouse Aigeer Wireless Bluetooth Mouse Aigeer Upgrade Wireless Bluetooth Mouse Connection Mode BT5.2/3.0, 2.4GHz (USB/USB-C) BT5.2/3.0, 2.4GHz (USB/USB-C) BT5.2/3.0, 2.4GHz (USB-A & USB-C Receiver 2 in 1) 3 DPI 800/ 1200/ 1600 800/ 1200/ 1600 800/ 1200/ 1600 Silent ✓ ✓ ✓ Rechargeable ✓ ✓ ✓ Battery Capacity 500mAh 500mAh 800mAh Compatibility MacBook Air/ MacBook Pro/ iPad/ Mac/ Laptop/ Computer/ PCs/ Windows/ Linux/ Mac OS MacBook Air/ MacBook Pro/ iPad/ Mac/ Laptop/ Computer/ PCs/ Windows/ Linux/ Mac OS MacBook Air/ MacBook Pro/ iPad/ Mac/ Laptop/ Computer/ PCs/ Windows/ Linux/ Mac OS Color Black/ Pink/ Blue/ Green/ White Black/ Silver/ Deep Green/ Blue/ Yellow/ Pink/ Purple/ Green Black/ White/ Rose Gold/ Gold/ Grey/ Silver

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Effective
reviews.reviewText: Small enough for travel. Mouse has Bluetooth or USB adapter. Receives the charge via USB-C cable. Scroller works well. No back or forward buttons (that's a perk for my preferences). Solid product and great value for a laptop mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Great mouse, charges quickly, connected to my mac right away, and worked immediately. It's lightweight and very quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple little mouse, good for small hands
reviews.reviewText: I wanted an inexpensive, easy to use wireless mouse. This one works well. Honestly, it might be a bit too small--and I have small hands! But it works well and is easy to wake up. It doesn't wake up just with scrolling; you need to right- or left-click it. (I almost sent it back because I thought it didn't work before I figured this out.) And it's not the smoothest roll, but using a mouse pad helps. I love the soft baby pink color. Overall a good purchase for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really liked this mouse. It was so easy to set up with Bluetooth and I loved that it provides the 2.4g option as well. It has worked very smoothly so far and as someone who is so picky with how a mouse feels, it has comfortable positioning. Another quick thing to point out is that the clicking has a very subtle/soft noise so it is not loud at all. Overall, I will greatly recommend to buy this mouse if you are looking for something small, smooth and noise free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My wife love it
reviews.reviewText: I can't express how much the Wireless Bluetooth Mouse with USB C has improved our MacBook experience! Its Bluetooth connectivity is a game-changer, effortlessly syncing with our laptop without the hassle of extra dongles. The rechargeable feature is a lifesaver, ensuring that we're never caught in the middle of something important with a dead mouse.And let me tell you, the silent operation is a blessing! Perfect for our home office, it doesn't disrupt the peaceful atmosphere. Plus, the sleek white design adds a touch of style. My wife absolutely loves how comfortable it is to use. This mouse has truly surpassed our expectations, making navigating through our MacBook a breeze. It's not just a mouse; it's become an essential part of our daily routine. A heartfelt five-star recommendation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for my MacBook Air. The first connection was not easy due to the minimum instructions. Once connected, it is not very fast, but gets the job done. To get from point A to point B, I have to lift it at least twice. It is cute and makes little to no noise. I would not recommend if needed for heavy computer work. I personally just need it to navigate through my laptop, so it is not a big deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Perfect. Amazing Price
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse. I got the pink one and it is so cute! It has a manual feature for regular USB and my favorite part, a USB C extension adapter for laptops and computers with that function. It also has a bluetooth which works perfectly and is so easy to set up. 100% recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up and use
reviews.reviewText: If you need a portable and reliable mouse, this is the one for you. The rechargeable battery, Bluetooth connectivity and slim design make it an excellent option for anyone who needs a mouse on the go.

I have just received this mouse and I already love it! The colour matches the one displayed on the product’s photos and it looks so cute with my keyboard. You can use it with bluetooth or with the 2.4g link (that is provided with the mouse!). It even comes with an adapter for usb-c, which I needed so this is definitely a plus! The “clicks” are also really quiet and nice, so it doesn’t disturb people working around you.Overall it’s a great buy!

Es un producto super bueno, cumple lo que promete y funciona increíble.No suena, realmente es muy silencioso, se conecta super rápido, principalmente lo conecto por Bluetooth, y apenas lo enciendo y ya esta funcionando.La batería le dura bastante, para lo que yo lo uso que son como 4 o 5 horas diarias, lo he cargado muy veces. Además ya viene incluido un adaptador de usb c, que puedo ir cargando en mi tablet mientras lo uso.Además es muy cómodo y el color es igual como en la foto. Lo recomendaría sin problemas, en mi experiencia es muy bueno.
Exactly what I was looking for! Super easy to install and works great!

Me gusta: el tamaño es bueno, el diseño abultado es ergonómico, el botón DPI funciona muy bien para cambiar de velocidad de desplazamiento del puntero, funciona excelente en superficie de plástico, madera y granito y no es necesario un mousepad también funciona sobre la misma superficie de la computadora. El bluetooth conecta rápido y la MacBook Air lo reconoce sin problema.Atención a los que les interesa la practicidad: este mouse carga con USB-C por lo que se acabaron los cables especiales para cargar el mouse, usas el cargador del celular sin problema.No me gusta: es muy ligero y parece que no estoy usando el mouse, la rueda de scroll se siente demasiado frágil como que va a dejar de funcionar en menos de un año sin embargo en las primeras pruebas desplaza páginas muy bien, solo falta la sensación de calidad que este dispositivo, por el precio, no tiene.Game changer: no me di cuenta y viene con un adaptador USB a USC-C, entonces me ha solucionado todo porque se puede usar el USB del mouse y conectarlo con el 2.4Gz (las MacBook Air solo traen USB-C) entonces puedo conectar cualquier otro dispositivo USB regular, pero además le puedo conectar una memoria USB ¡al celular! usando el adaptador incluido.Por el precio no me dolería perderlo, además de que llegó relativamente rápido; de usar el trackpad a usar este mouse es una gran diferencia y es como un puente entre un mouse diez veces más caro. Volveré a comprar, muy buena opción para un electrónico económico.

He comprado infinidad de Maus desde las marcas las populares y este Maus es increíble a un muy buen precio la calidad no es tan alta de los materias peor la verdad está súper bien construido, su funcionalidad muy buena nada ruidoso y sobretodo es Recargable y la batería realmente muy buen! Lo compraré de nuevo para mi esposa sin duda gran producto
